    • Method Detail

      • cameraStreamStarted

        public void cameraStreamStarted(int width,
                                int height,
                                java.lang.String pixelFormat,
                                int cameraIndex,
                                boolean cameraIsFrontFacing)
        Description copied from interface: CameraEventListener
        Called when the camera preview is started. The video dimensions and frame rate are passed through, along with information about the camera.
        Specified by:
        cameraStreamStarted in interface CameraEventListener
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the video image in pixels.
        height - The height of the video image in pixels.
        pixelFormat - A string with format in which buffers will be pushed. Supported values include "NV21", "NV12", "YUV_420_888", "RGBA", "RGB_565", and "MONO".
        cameraIndex - Zero-based index of the camera in use. If only one camera is present, will be 0.
        cameraIsFrontFacing - false if camera is rear-facing (the default) or true if camera is facing toward the user.

      • cameraStreamFrame

        public void cameraStreamFrame(byte[] frame,
                              int frameSize)
        Description copied from interface: CameraEventListener
        Called when the camera preview has a new frame ready.
        Specified by:
        cameraStreamFrame in interface CameraEventListener
        Parameters:
        frame - A byte array from the camera, in the camera's capture format.

      • cameraStreamFrame

        public void cameraStreamFrame(java.nio.ByteBuffer[] framePlanes,
                              int[] framePlanePixelStrides,
                              int[] framePlaneRowStrides)
        Description copied from interface: CameraEventListener
        Called when the camera preview has a new frame ready.
        Specified by:
        cameraStreamFrame in interface CameraEventListener
        Parameters:
        framePlanes - An array of ByteBuffers from the camera's frame planes, in the camera's capture format.

      • cameraStreamStopped

        public void cameraStreamStopped()
        Description copied from interface: CameraEventListener
        Called when the capture preview is stopped. No new frames will be sent.
        Specified by:
        cameraStreamStopped in interface CameraEventListener
